Initial Setup and Running ExperimentsÂ¶

In order to intall and run EPOS you need to follow the steps indicatd in Installation. After this step, open the terminal (command prompt in Windows machines) and navigate to the EPOS folder. You can run EPOS from your terminal or by using the IDE of your choice. More information about running EPOS from the terminal is available at Command Line Arguments.
